name: CoverageConverter
description: Convert .coverage file into .coveragexml for use in Code Coverage Report
author: Rogeriohsjr

inputs.name: searchFolderForTestFiles
inputs.label: Search Folder for Test Files
inputs.helpMarkDown: This should be the root for find the Test Files. This is not the full path. This also will be used to find the .coverage file.

inputs.name: vsTestExeFileLocation
inputs.label: vsTest Exe File Location
inputs.helpMarkDown: Change if needed, the VS is installed by default in windows machine.

inputs.name: searchFolderForCodeCoverageFile
inputs.label: Search Folder for Test Files
inputs.helpMarkDown: This should be the root for find the Code Coverage Files.

inputs.name: temporaryFileCoveragexml
inputs.label: Temporary CoverageXml File Location
inputs.helpMarkDown: The begin will be the temporaryFolderForCodeCoverage + whatever you add here e.g $(Agent.TempDirectory)\TestResults\DynamicCodeCoverage.coveragexml, where $(Agent.TempDirectory) will be something like d:\a\1

inputs.name: codeCoverageExeFileLocation
inputs.label: Code Coverage Exe File Location
inputs.defaultValue: C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft Visual Studio\2019\Enterprise\Team Tools\Dynamic Code Coverage Tools\CodeCoverage.exe
inputs.helpMarkDown: Change if needed, the VS is installed by default in windows machine.
